definition: the basic structural and functional unit of all organisms
details:
noun
- the basic structural and functional unit of all organisms
= example: the basic structural and functional unit of all organisms
- a device that delivers an electric current as the result of a chemical reaction
= synonyms: electric cell
- a room where a prisoner is kept
= synonyms: jail cell, prison cell
- small room in which a monk or nun lives
= synonyms: cubicle
- any small compartment
= example: any small compartment
- a hand-held mobile radiotelephone for use in an area divided into small sections, each with its own short-range transmitter/receiver
= synonyms: cellular telephone, cellular phone, cellphone, mobile phone
- a small unit serving as part of or as the nucleus of a larger political movement
= synonyms: cadre
